pages.text: Applied Energistics 2 is a mod mostly centered around the concept of using Energy, and the Transformation of Energy in a unique way such as: $(li)Bulk storage $(li)Automatic crafting $(li)Automatic block placing/ breaking $(li)...and much more$(br2) $(l:https://appliedenergistics.github.io/)The wiki is available online$(/l)

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: $(li)Build a $(item)Charger$() $(li)Power it with: $(li2)$(item)Vibration Chamber$() or $(li2)generators from Tech Reborn or $(li2)a $(item)Wooden Crank$() $(li)Put a $(item)Vanilla compass$() in the charger and charge it to craft a $(item)Meteorite Compass$().
Next: Use the meteorite compass to find meteorites, which have a chance to contain $(item)presses$(), $(item)quartz blocks$(), and $(item)budding quartz$().

pages.title: Read the wiki for more
pages.text: For much more information on AE2 please reference the online wiki
